sense.def:
The cause of an event
je tisto, kar povzroči neki dogodek.

seg.quote: Nobody knew the cause of the explosion.
The men died of natural causes.

sense.def:
Če ima človek
cause for a particular feeling or action
, ima dober razlog za neko čustvo ali dejanje.

seg.quote: Years of training gave him every cause for confidence.
I have no cause to go back.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ,
or
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ

sense.def:
To cause something
pomeni poskrbeti, da se nekaj zgodi.

seg.quote: What's causing you so much concern?
The sound caused her to step aside.

sense.def:
A cause
je tudi cilj, ki ga neka skupina ljudi podpira ali za katerega se bojuje.
